DOC.brief_summary: to evaluate the influence of PRGF treatment on patient suffering from OA knee
DOC.brief_title: Preparation Rich in Growth Factors (PRGF) Treatment for Osteoarthritis of the Knee
DOC.detailed_description: Autologous platelet-secreted growth factors (GFs) may have therapeutic effects in osteoarthritis (OA) capsular joints via multiple mechanisms. Our aim is to examine the effect of a platelet-derived preparation rich in growth factors (PRGFs) in OA knee
DOC.criteria: age 4075 years old diagnosed Oa of the knee more then 1 year no knee deformation mental of physical disabilities pregnancy deformities of the knee
